Title: IE requests issue
Description: IE requests not properly behaving with `rewritehashlinks`.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.0.0 up to 3.0.12, all versions starting from 3.1.0 up to 3.1.11
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.0.0, all versions after 3.0.12 before 3.1.0, all versions after 3.1.11
